mapper.select: SELECT A.SITEID,A.SITENAME,A.BSNO,A.INCNO ,A.ADDR1,A.ADDR2,A.ADDR3 ,A.PRSDNAME ,A.MOBILE1,A.MOBILE2,A.MOBILE3 ,A.FAXTEL1,A.FAXTEL2,A.FAXTEL3 ,A.TELNO1,A.TELNO2,A.TELNO3 ,A.EMAIL ,CASE WHEN A.SITESIZE = '1' THEN '대기업' WHEN A.SITESIZE = '2' THEN '중견기업' WHEN A.SITESIZE = '3' THEN '중소기업' WHEN A.SITESIZE = '4' THEN '소기업' END AS SITESIZE_ ,SITESIZE ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.TB980010 WHERE USERNO = A.OWNER) AS OWNER_ ,A.OWNER ,A.COTYPE,A.BSCOND,A.BSTYPE ,CONVERT(varchar,A.FREGDATE,23) AS FREGDATE ,A.SITELOGO ,CASE WHEN A.ISDELETE = '0' THEN '사용' WHEN A.ISDELETE = '1' THEN '미사용' END AS ISDELETE_ ,A.ISDELETE ,A.SITEMEMO ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_SITE_LICENSE WHERE SITEID = A.SITEID) AS TOTALCNT FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.TB980070 A WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid}
